H0.text: Which poet is buried in Grasmere churchyard. Coleridge

H1.text: Which poet is buried in Grasmere churchyard. Southey

H2.text: Which poet is buried in Grasmere churchyard. Keats

H3.text: Which poet is buried in Grasmere churchyard. Wordsworth

A4.text: He was buried at St Oswald's Church, Grasmere.
